attributes.documentation:
@title ERC20 interface is a subset of the ERC20 specification.
 @notice see https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20
attributes.name: ERC20
SafeERC20

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that revert on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers truncating the quotient, reverts on division by zero.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, reverts on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation:
@dev Divides two numbers and returns the remainder (unsigned integer modulo),
reverts when dividing by zero.
attributes.name: mod

attributes.documentation: @title Claimable, allowing contract to withdraw tokens accidentally sent to itself
attributes.name: Claimable
_claim

attributes.documentation:
@title Ownable has an owner address and provides basic authorization control functions.
 This contract is modified version of the MIT OpenZepplin Ownable contract
 This contract allows for the transferOwnership operation to be made impossible
 https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-solidity/blob/master/contracts/ownership/Ownable.sol
attributes.name: Ownable

attributes.documentation: @notice Constructor sets the original owner of the contract and whether or not it is one time transferable.
@notice Reverts if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner
transferOwnership

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "owner cannot be set to zero address"

attributes.type: literal_string "owner cannot be set to zero address"
attributes.value: owner cannot be set to zero address

attributes.documentation:
@notice check if the ownership is transferable.
 @return true if the ownership is transferable.
attributes.name: isTransferable
renounceOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@notice Find out owner address
 @return address of the owner.
attributes.name: owner

attributes.documentation:
@notice Check if owner address
 @return true if sender is the owner of the contract.
attributes.name: _isOwner

attributes.documentation: @title ILicence interface describes methods for loading a TokenCard and updating licence amount.
attributes.name: ILicence

attributes.documentation:
@title Licence loads the TokenCard and transfers the licence amout to the TKN Holder Contract.
 @notice the rest of the amount gets sent to the CryptoFloat
attributes.name: Licence

attributes.documentation: @notice Reverts if called by any address other than the DAO contract.
attributes.name: onlyDAO

attributes.documentation: @notice Ether can be deposited from any source, so this contract should be payable by anyone.

@notice this allows for people to see the scaled licence amount
 @return the scaled licence amount, used to calculate the split when loading.
attributes.name: licenceAmountScaled

attributes.documentation:
@notice allows one to see the address of the CryptoFloat
 @return the address of the multi-sig cryptocurrency float contract.
attributes.name: cryptoFloat

attributes.documentation:
@notice allows one to see the address TKN holder contract
 @return the address of the token holder contract.
attributes.name: tokenHolder

attributes.documentation:
@notice allows one to see the address of the DAO
 @return the address of the DAO contract.
attributes.name: licenceDAO

attributes.documentation:
@notice The address of the TKN token
 @return the address of the TKN contract.
attributes.name: tknContractAddress

attributes.documentation:
@notice This locks the cryptoFloat address
 @dev so that it can no longer be updated
attributes.name: lockFloat

attributes.documentation:
@notice This locks the TokenHolder address
 @dev so that it can no longer be updated
attributes.name: lockHolder

attributes.documentation:
@notice This locks the DAO address
 @dev so that it can no longer be updated
attributes.name: lockLicenceDAO

attributes.documentation:
@notice This locks the TKN address
 @dev so that it can no longer be updated
attributes.name: lockTKNContractAddress

attributes.documentation:
@notice Updates the address of the cyptoFloat.
 @param _newFloat This is the new address for the CryptoFloat
attributes.name: updateFloat

attributes.documentation:
@notice Updates the address of the Holder contract.
 @param _newHolder This is the new address for the TokenHolder
attributes.name: updateHolder

attributes.documentation:
@notice Updates the address of the DAO contract.
 @param _newDAO This is the new address for the Licence DAO
attributes.name: updateLicenceDAO

attributes.documentation:
@notice Updates the address of the TKN contract.
 @param _newTKN This is the new address for the TKN contract
attributes.name: updateTKNContractAddress

attributes.documentation:
@notice Updates the TKN licence amount
 @param _newAmount is a number between 1 and MAX_AMOUNT_SCALE
attributes.name: updateLicenceAmount
load

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ETH sent is not equal to amount"

attributes.type: literal_string "ETH sent is not equal to amount"
attributes.value: ETH sent is not equal to amount

attributes.documentation: / @notice Withdraw tokens from the smart contract to the specified account.
attributes.name: claim

attributes.documentation: @notice returns whether or not the CryptoFloat address is locked
attributes.name: floatLocked

attributes.documentation: @notice returns whether or not the TokenHolder address is locked
attributes.name: holderLocked

attributes.documentation: @notice returns whether or not the Licence DAO address is locked
attributes.name: licenceDAOLocked

attributes.documentation: @notice returns whether or not the TKN address is locked
